attributes.action: Completely Abolish Community 'Punishments' and Send ALL Offenders to Prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't care if prisons are reaching capacity, just build some more. I am sick to death of hearing people who commit serious offences and constantly re-offend getting a slap on the wrist and community service. All offences should warrant a prison sentence. No more of this second chance rubbish, it doesn't work. What ever happened to punishing crime.
